text: I was out in Utah talking about environmental issues & on the plane back, the Mueller report came out—so I started reading, & read late into the night. The report hands this now to Congress & the fundamental question for us is: "Is there going to be some accountability here?" http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1119637356896768001/img/8e45qAYK0QdnsbB5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1119637356896768001/vid/320x320/xORJm04Lp1fYbvt6.mp4?tag=11
The Marijuana Justice Act wouldn’t just legalize marijuana—it would expunge the records of millions of people who have been hurt by the War on Drugs.

RT @ABCWorldNews “DERAIL OR OBSTRUCT”: Democratic presidential candidate Senator Elizabeth Warren urged lawmakers to open impeachment proceedings against President Donald Trump at a rally saying he took steps to try to “derail or obstruct” the Mueller investigation. https://abcnews.go.com/ http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1119684595002368000/img/rThM_s-PqBcuvYLo.jpg

RT @RepDebDingell The first #100DaysForThePeople brought progress on countless issues that impact working men and women every single day. Looking forward to seeing what Congress can deliver in the months ahead! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4imeEkX4AEsyTj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1119326787899727872/vid/320x180/ivUp4GLlmpLxK54G.mp4?tag=11

RT @BLeeForCongress When it comes to protecting our health care from the GOP’s attacks or holding Trump accountable, @TeamPelosi is right: do not underestimate the power of Congress. 
http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1118258248359010304/img/uptvZgyyKs_nfVGN.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1118258248359010304/vid/320x180/xRUjylZfSdro7mHV.mp4?tag=11

It’s time we legalize marijuana at the federal level and restore justice to our communities. Communities of color have been disproportionately impacted by the War on Drugs. We must reverse this trend.

We must embrace paper ballots and upgrades to our election infrastructure in 2020. Russia and other foreign adversaries cannot hack a piece of paper like they can a computer. Every voter deserves to have their vote counted. It’s imperative we work now to protect our elections.

I read the Mueller report.  When I got to the end, I realized this is a point of principle. Because it matters not just for this president, but for all future presidents. No one is above the law. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1119462581943656448/img/bsR1cH11VLkcuxAA.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1119462581943656448/vid/320x180/PbKZ8FD96WP4SivD.mp4?tag=11

Hedge fund billionaire Eddie Lampert reaped huge profits while destroying the jobs of 250,000 people. This is what a rigged economy looks like.

RT @Astrid_NV Families are dealing with their immigration status every single day. Grateful that Sen @CoryBooker took time out of his busy schedule to hear it straight from them. They ARE somebody. https://twitter.com/dreambignv/status/1119780535625064449 QT @dreambignv Gracias Sen. @CoryBooker and team for meeting with Nevada immigrant families. Our families are diverse and so are their stories, we appreciate you taking the time to listen to them and hope you enjoyed the Vegan tamales made with love by the DREAMer Moms! 

#DreamBigNV http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4pCdKZU0AA_o2t.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4pCdKYUUAI1_Qj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4pCdKYUcAELkdr.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4pCdKZUEAAI0Ur.jpg

As we work to legalize marijuana nationwide, we’ve got to also ensure equity in the marijuana industry. Communities that have been historically targeted by the failed War on Drugs can't be left out of opportunities to participate in the legal marijuana economy.

The New Colossus says, “Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to be free." Nowhere does it say kidnap families seeking a better life. These vigilantes are pointing to the administration as their license to do this. https://twitter.com/SamTLevin/status/1119023657764831232 QT @SamTLevin An armed pro-Trump militia in New Mexico appears to be detaining migrants at the border and working with Border Patrol agents to coordinate their arrests. ACLU says these are kidnappings by vigilantes: https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2019/apr/18/new-mexico-migrants-armed-militia-detained

When we are in the White House we will attack the problem of gentrification and rising rents in America. We need a massive effort to build the affordable housing this country desperately needs, and that's an effort I intend to lead. https://www.greenvilleonline.com/story/news/2019/04/19/bernie-sanders-south-carolina-rally-danny-glover-dr-cornel-west-affordable-housing-greenville-sc/3520397002/

A full-employment economy is not a radical idea. A federal job guarantee will lower the crime rate, improve mental health, and create a stronger sense of community. It will create a much healthier and happier America.

Thanks so much for having me! We’ve got to make sure workers are included in company buyback profits—not just shareholders. https://twitter.com/civicaction/status/1100823393648050176 QT @civicaction Senator @CoryBooker has a plan to fix stock buybacks so workers get their share of corporate profits. Learn all about it in the latest episode of Pitchfork Economics:

The genius of the internet is that it enables entrepreneurship on a level playing field. That's why it's so critical that we restore #NetNeutrality after the FCC gutted it in favor of multi-billion-dollar broadband companies. Proud to be a cosponsor of the Save the Internet Act.

Last night on @maddow, I made it clear: We can’t ignore a president’s repeated efforts to obstruct an investigation into his own disloyal behavior. The House should initiate impeachment proceedings against the President of the United States. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4pMEY4W0AEglbm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1119462581943656448/vid/320x180/PbKZ8FD96WP4SivD.mp4?tag=11

Twenty years after Columbine, the survivors are now confronted with how to tell their children about it — when their own kids are participating in school lockdown drills. The entire Littleton Community is in my thoughts today.
https://www.theatlantic.com/education/archive/2019/04/20-years-after-columbine-survivors-are-parents-now/587224/

Armed militia groups have no legal authority to detain immigrant families. This is dangerous and disturbing. Border patrol agents must cease working with them in any way. These blatant attempts to intimidate immigrants seeking asylum cannot be tolerated. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/04/18/us/new-mexico-militia.html

VW operates in province where Chinese govt holds some 1 million Uighurs & other minorities in concentration camps for “re-education” https://twitter.com/rick_n/status/1118501730579357696 QT @rick_n Volkswagen built a factory in China’s Xinjiang, where up to 1 million Uighurs have been detained. Dear Auggie,
 
I hear you, I see you, and I promise that I will continue to fight for you and your future. Climate change is here and it's time we took bold steps to combat it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4ohXNvX4AIFKcx.jpg

Medicare for all. College for all. A Green New Deal. Real criminal justice and immigration reform. A $15 minimum wage. These are no longer radical ideas. Our movement is stronger than ever and together we will turn those ideas into reality. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4mwgsBX4AA5ByY.jpg

Don’t forget: entry to every National Park in California and across the country is *free* today to kick off National Park Week. Our public lands belong to the American people - don't miss this opportunity to explore.

You can find your park here 👇.

Columbine was 20 years ago, and yet we still haven’t taken meaningful action to stop gun violence. Enough is enough—we can't wait for progress. People are getting shot every day. It was time then, and it's time now.

I give you thanks, O LORD;though you have been angry with me,
your anger has abated, and you have consoled me. God indeed is my salvation; I am confident and unafraid. For the LORD is my strength and my might,and he has been my salvation.

Isaiah 12:1-2

Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence in schools after Columbine. 
After Virginia Tech. 
After Northern Illinois University. 
After Sandy Hook.
After Umpqua Community College.
After Parkland. 
After Santa Fe High School.
Inner City schools.

How many more?
